author: sharan narain
comment: App looks good. 3 star. Huawei Watch not connecting. Keeps saying turn on device Bluetooth! I am on Android Wear Dev Preview.
title: Can't connect Huawei Watch

author: Raul Lucas
comment: Hi I liked the app but since in May 2016, you mentioned that Tizen was in your roadmap for the next few months, I wonder when you think you will have it ready? I have a Samsung Gear S3 and this app would be very useful for me. Thanks Raul

author: noam katz
comment: tizen store The app looks great, when you gonna release  an tizen store app?

author: Angelique Manley
comment: I've barely installed it and started updating my profile and I'm already disappointed...can't enter height in imperial measurement, only 2 racquet brands render "Willson" and "Dunlop"...yes that's right Wilson is spelled wrong. Amazing. And only 2 choices. First impressions are important. They need to fix some of these things soon. Otherwise people will abandon.

reply.author: Alerteenz
reply.content:
Hi Angelique, we are working on localization services - that way,we will be adding other measurement systems and time zones (for UK, US etc.). 
As for the racket brands, they have all been added for tennis rackets. 
Thank you for your feedback - don't hesitate to email us with other inquiries at info@pulse-play.com

title: Needs work

author: kapay ako
comment: works fine on my pulse play watch but on the DZ09 android smartwatch has only sounds but no display. not sure if it needs to install the app on the watch or it only works in a specific android wear brand.

author: rzkuh0 kuh
comment: I tried to start a game but there is a message that says:" no devices were found". if you will fix it ill give 5 stars

reply.author: Alerteenz
reply.content: Hi rzkuh0, The Gear S2 in not working on Android OS; it works on Tizen. We don't currently support Tizen but it is on our roadmap for the next few months. Stay put & we'll announce when it's live.

title: It doesnt connect to my gear s2

author: Elad Spira
comment: I'm usually not a racquet person. But trying this app wearing the pulse play smartwatch on, just made playing experience real, vivid, faster and I enjoy every moment of it. We were playing ping pong in the office for too long during our lunch break and our boss had to get us back to work. Now I can't stop thinking of the lunch break and how I kick my colleagues ass!
title: I blame you guys

author: gil david
comment: Amazing app for every Tennis player.
title: Pulse

author: Russell Bishop
comment: The prospect is exciting so I look forward to improvements!
title: Crashes lots, but its brand new
